question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. man in yellow
B. soccer ball
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man in yellow is standing in the foreground on the left, while the soccer ball is further away on the field, making the man clearly closer to the camera.
